name: static-site-template
description: A static site template using metalsmith.

scripts.build:js: bash -c "browserify src/main.js -o dist/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015] ] && npm run uglify"
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && (npm run build:metalsmith && npm run copy:assets &&  npm run build:css && npm run build:js)
scripts.watch: npm run build:all && nodemon --ignore dist/ -e scss,html,md,js,jpg,png -x
scripts.start: bash -c "(npm run build:all && npm run server)"

author: Julius Rajala
